setting.integration.add.application_tip: Select the ID of the application you just created in the gateway below.
setting.integration.add.credential_tip: Please create an application in the Web GUI of the gateway (Network Server - Application) and paste the generated information below into it.
setting.integration.available_function_w: The following functions are not available and need to be configured with Open API under integrated configuration before they can be used.
setting.integration.codec.customize_tip: Please enter the Codec file address used for coding and decoding the device data..
setting.integration.device.sync_tip: This operation will reset the Payload Codec of the node device you added to the gateway to empty. Please operate with caution.
setting.integration.device.update_codec_: Used to obtain the latest product codec from the specified acquired address. Note: The new codec is only valid for newly added devices.
setting.integration.function_data_sync_c: Confirm or not to perform this operation. synchronization will only add non-existing devices and will not update the information of existing devices.
setting.integration.function_data_sync_d: This service will pull all device information from the Milesight Development Platform that is bound to a connected application and telemetry data reported by devices.
setting.integration.gateway.delete_bulk_: Deleting a gateway will also delete the node devices under the gateway. Are you sure you want to delete this {1} gateway and the node devices under it?
setting.integration.gateway.delete_tip: Deleting a gateway will also delete the node devices under it. Are you sure you want to delete the gateway and the node devices under it?
setting.integration.label.device_bulk_de: Are you sure you want to delete these {1} devices in batches?
setting.integration.label.device_delete_: Are you sure you want to delete this device?
setting.integration.message.sync_device_: Is it confirmed to execute the operation of synchronizing the device?
setting.integration.openapi_config_helpe: API Key is used to authenticate with the server.
setting.integration.openapi_helper_text: Proactively pull device information and device telemetry data at regular intervals via OpenAPI.
setting.integration.sync_device_empty_mo: Please fill in the required information completely
setting.integration.webhook_helper_text: Receive the data pushed by Milesight Development Platform in real time via the Webhook service, and paste the URL address generated below, into the application from Milesight Development Platform.
